summary: 16S26 / NHTSA RECALL 16V-384 - I HAVE CONTACTED MY DEALERSHIP "HELFMAN FORD"  SEVERAL TIMES REGARDING THIS RECALL AND WAS TOLD THAT THE PART WAS NOT AVAILABLE TO FIX MY CAR.  I ALSO CONTACTED FORD HEAD OFFICE IN MICHIGAN AND WAS TOLD THE SAME.  THEY SAID WHEN THEY HAVE THE PARTS THEY WILL CONTACT ME. IT HAS BEEN A YEAR AND THREE MONTHS NOW SINCE I RECEIVED THE RECALL NOTICE, AND STILL NO ACTION WAS TAKEN, AND NO RESOLUTION
